00001 #include "AffineTransformationMatrix.h"

00004 #include <cmath>

00006 namespace jvgs
00007 {
00008     namespace math

00010         AffineTransformationMatrix::AffineTransformationMatrix():
00011                 Matrix(3, 3)
00012         {
00013         }
00014 
00015         AffineTransformationMatrix::AffineTransformationMatrix(
00016                 float r0c0, float r0c1, float r0c2,
00017                 float r1c0, float r1c1, float r1c2):
00018                 Matrix(3, 3)
00019         {
00020             setValue(0, 0, r0c0);
00021             setValue(0, 1, r0c1);
00022             setValue(0, 2, r0c2);
00023             setValue(1, 0, r1c0);
00024             setValue(1, 1, r1c1);
00025             setValue(1, 2, r1c2);
00026         }
00027 
00028         AffineTransformationMatrix::~AffineTransformationMatrix()
00029         {
00030         }
00031 
00032         Vector2D AffineTransformationMatrix::operator*(const Vector2D &vector)
00033                 const
00034         {
00035             return Vector2D(getValue(0, 0) * vector.getX() +
00036                             getValue(0, 1) * vector.getY() +
00037                             getValue(0, 2) * 1.0f,
00038                             getValue(1, 0) * vector.getX() + 
00039                             getValue(1, 1) * vector.getY() + 
00040                             getValue(1, 2) * 1.0f);
00041         }
00042 
00043         void AffineTransformationMatrix::translate(const Vector2D &vector)
00044         {
00045             *this *= AffineTransformationMatrix(1.0f, 0.0f, vector.getX(),
00046                                                 0.0f, 1.0f, vector.getY());
00047         }
00048 
00049         void AffineTransformationMatrix::scale(const Vector2D &vector)
00050         {
00051             *this *= AffineTransformationMatrix(
00052                     vector.getX(),          0.0f, 0.0f,
00053                     0.0f,          vector.getY(), 0.0f);
00054         }
00055 
00056         void AffineTransformationMatrix::rotate(float degrees)
00057         {
00058             float radians = degrees * float(M_PI) / 180.0f;
00059             *this *= AffineTransformationMatrix(
00060                     cos(radians), -sin(radians), 0.0f,
00061                     sin(radians),  cos(radians), 0.0f);
00062         }
00063 
00064         void AffineTransformationMatrix::rotate(float degrees,
00065                                                 const Vector2D &point)
00066         {
00067             translate(point);
00068             rotate(degrees);
00069             translate(point);
00070         }
00071 
00072         void AffineTransformationMatrix::skewX(float degrees)
00073         {
00074             float radians = degrees * float(M_PI) / 180.0f;
00075             *this *= AffineTransformationMatrix(1.0f, tan(radians), 0.0f,
00076                                                 0.0f,         1.0f, 0.0f);
00077         }
00078 
00079         void AffineTransformationMatrix::skewY(float degrees)
00080         {
00081             float radians = degrees * float(M_PI) / 180.0f;
00082             *this *= AffineTransformationMatrix(        1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f,
00083                                                 tan(radians), 1.0f, 0.0f);
00084         }
00085     }
00086 }
